column3: â€œI still like this stain better than most. Tastes good, you get nice and high and it doesn't give you couch lock , so you can get your stuff done during the day.â€
â€œExcellent strain for patients with ADHD. Very helpful with anxiety and really helps calm the mindâ€

â€œI tried this strain for the first time a few days ago. I have to say if you can get past the first smell you will be ok. This is 100% a creeper. I took two hits and was like ummmm ok where is the high? Then a few moments later BAM!!! it me like a tone of bricks! I had never been so high in my life! I found myself completely focused and my whole body felt as if it were vibrating. I have only tried a few others ; OG, P...â€

â€œStrain: Permafrost OG
Head High: 10
Body High: 3
Tips: Take when in a good mood or around a great atmosphere. If you take it while sketchy, you'll regret it. High lasts all day, even with naps.â€

â€œPerma Frost has become my all-time favorite strain. I have had some amazing spiritual epiphanies while under her gentle influence, and I even embarked on a 10 mile walk through the brisk night air. It was a great experience, I felt very exhilarated and alive. I find the mindset it puts me in to be very similar to the most positive aspects of a psychedelic trip! This strain also provides a buzzy body high that is extr...â€

â€œPermafrost was a great strain. It was very energizing and made EVERYTHING hilarious! It also shed a whole new light on a lot of experiences. This is a very social strain, so its best to smoke with your buddies. The smell is incredible, just like pine.â€

â€œMy absolute favorite strain! Extremely uplifting, great for anxiety! 

I'm prone to paranoia and sensitive to THC in general, so I always tread carefully when it comes to sativa-dominant hybrids. However, Permafrost has consistently provided a wonderful clear-headed and euphoric high, without any paranoia whatsoever. The body high is subtle and I personally did not feel the pain relief was anything significant, but t...â€

â€œI grew this strain from clone in a 100% perlite hempy bucket.  The plant was a gem, never a lick of problems and grew to harvest in about 68 days (Flower).   It was smallish when I started so I ended up with about 2oz dry.     

This was slow dried then jar cured to 58% relative humidity and sealed.  My test smoke was three bong hits from the product when it reached 58%RH so early if no cure in jars at this time ex...â€

â€œPermafrost is a true gift for sufferers of anxiety and depression. It works wonders in the morning as an engine starter and replaced my red bull/coffee.  Permafrost has a nutty taste that is reminiscent of white widow, though no where near as strong, mixed with a mint like flavor. The instant effects have driven away several panic attacks and for that reason alone I always try to keep some permafrost on hand.â€
â€œDamn my asshole tinglesâ€
â€œGreat Taste, one of my favorites.â€
â€œalmost as good as Elvis. Very uplifting and fun. energized and helps with muscles. love itâ€
â€œI have very mixed feelings about this strain. In low doses its exactly the pick me up in the morning you are looking for, but when you consume heavily I end up very paranoid and anxious.â€

â€œOne of my favorites, me and my friend got super chopped of this strain and somehow convinced our German Teacher to leave the whole room to us before she left. I'm sorry for getting off topic, so I'll talk about the high now. In a nutshell I'd say the greatest effect it had on me is it made me just be in a very good mood and very talkative in a calm way, as well as a good one to get the munchies with because it seemed...â€

â€œI've smoked several different phenotypes of permafrost..   Right now I have the best batch i have ever gotten from my MMJ dealer, perfectly cured and sparkly smelly and yummy all the way around, so i thought I would write a review real quick.  First of all the smell of this stuff is very sweet and piney, very nice.  The smell after smoked is truly unique and seriously fkin pungent and dank.  The high is a creeper, ve...â€

â€œI really like this strain. I just randomly came across it and was pleasantly surprised that this strain is cheap (where I bought it anyways), tastes great, and works wonders for my anxiety. I wasnâ€™t expecting the strain to curve it at all but it did so thatâ€™s always a big plus for me in strains. Big buds with beautiful crystals. Makes me happy, euphoric, relaxed, and focused. Iâ€™m able to enjoy tv watching, creative w...â€

â€œI have acute gastritis and the worst part about most days is the nausea and pain. Permafrost takes all the nausea and the pain away associated with my medical condition. This is close to the top of the list of best buds so far.â€

â€œGood for headache, migraine, insomnia, depression, stress, appetite, nausea, pms, neuropathic pain, body pain. Offers a wonderful feeling of euphoria
Helps with relaxation and sleeping.â€

â€œExtremely relaxing for me. I suffer from depression, social anxiety and psoriatic arthritis & a few toots of this help me with all 3. Very smooth too.â€

â€œ1st off a couple of things, I live in Sacramento and this strain is huge here in nor cal and after speaking to MANY MASTER GROWERS of this exact strain, the TRUE GENETICS are actually (White Widow x Northern Lights). Its considered to be very close to a 50/50 hybrid. I've bought this strain from 6 different dispensaries here in Sac and I even bought an 8th of it while visiting my Dad in Washington and all 7 times the...â€

â€œOne of my favorite all time, all around strains. Potent midday to late afternoon strain. Slightly heavy for morning but still doable if need be. The perfect hybrid of all time! Slightly heavier than White Widow in terms of effects. Taste much like WW also. If i had to pick only one strain for all the time, this would be it. That's how much I like this strain. Only downside is the taste is not fruity (although I still...â€

â€œThis is a great strain, I mean fucking great. It definitely creeps up on you..and when you peak, the floaty head high along with the subtle stoney couch lock body high is just perfect. It doesn't make you tired but it doesn't get you too creative, uplifted either. It's a perfect blend of both worlds with the sativa rush slightly overpowering its chilled indica sister. I'm keyed off this right now as I write this, it'...â€

â€œIt devastates my throat but this is definitely my favorite strain. I have ibs, acid reflux diseasd, adhd, biplar disorder and an anxiety disorder and as early as just starting for feel it's effects, my mood is improved, my stomach doesn't hurt at all and it just whips away my anxiety and gives me motivation and focus too. It makes me WANT to do my tasks for the day. It treats all of my conditions effectively enough t...â€
â€œExtremely social, extremely talkative and pretty focused when using this. And a lovely sweet orange flavor. Dry eyes, but who cares.â€
â€œPermafrost is my second fav behind Death Star. Almost the same, but the DS seams more potent.â€

â€œiâ€™m bipolar. concentration, mania, depression, anxiety and chronic insomnia are all painful symptoms. i smoke medicinally so i only need two average hits for it to take effect. obviously, the sativa is almost instantaneously induced, gets real heady, like i need to do something, anything... energy was present. in about 20 minutes the underlying indica emerges hitting me in waves and as i watch a movie, i must fight t...â€

â€œOh permafrost how I love thee... let me count the ways. 
True to form permafrost will hype you up, put your mind in a blender, shake you around a bit, then gently lay you down. 
This strain also provides some nice visual effects.â€

â€œExcellent for reading. I'm working my way through Marx's Capital and this strain is especially good at helping me focus and retain what I read. I seem to appreciate prose more when I'm stoned. Not much of a body high unfortunately, but that can be good in a way.â€

â€œSuper high-energy and creative strain. I got this at 7 PM after smoking another strain all day that had me burnt out and struggling to stay awake. Had some of this, fifteen minutes later I'm wide awake. I work out, make baked apples, make spaghetti, and do the dishes. 

Taste is VERY strong. Like a punch to the tongue. It's not a horrible taste but it's not a super pleasant one either. Like tree sap and firewood. Ble...â€
â€œlovely, super happy stone.â€

â€œWant to be relaxed, yet productive at a strolling pace? Choose this. 
Want to go to bed after your stroll? Choose this. You don't feel zonked, but you can sleep if you choose to. Quite peacefully I might add.â€
â€œIf you have any mental disorders and are looking for some relief, this is for you..â€

â€œTastes like pine, reminds me of a hike through the woods in the PacNW.

Feels peaceful, meditative, focused, blissful.

Pain relief is centered on the neck / shoulders.

Vision is colorful, golden hour becomes even more golden...might waste film on some great shots.â€
â€œgood head high headache and cotton mouth. stoney stuff nonetheless!  harsh taste but gets your eyes red fast.â€

column4: studying or getting some work done.    Only negative comment is that it packs a mild dizzy feeling that can turn in a subtle feeling of a minimalistic vertigo.â€"

I'm keyed off this right now as I write this, it'...â€

â€œThis strain has a lightly sweet and minty smell. The flower has a medium amount of resin on it. The flowers density was medium and the light green color provided a nice compromise to the darkness of the hairs. 
Perfect for its ability to inspire and provide an increased sense of focus, Permafrost provides a high that could be described as euphoric, happy, focused, and driven. One interesting thing is that Permafrost ...â€
â€œI like this strain. It works OK for pain but very well for depression and anxiety. It comes on slow and doesn't take long to hit. I felt very relaxed and I always sleep well when I smoke this.â€

â€œThis is a long-time favorite strain.  Very uplifting, and happy, stress melts away as euphoria sets in.  Great day-time, social high, awesome for social gamers.  The body high is strong, joints feel warm, and are warmer to the touch relaxing any joint pain, or stiffness.  Muscles relax, and you just live happily.  This strain, without fail, also is great as an aphrodisiac.  I have found it to surprisingly do better a...â€
â€œA very smooth, relaxing high.  Very great with friends and an outdoor environment.  This strand inspires a uniquely tranquil and fun mood.  A new favorite.â€

â€œI only smoke hybrids and indicas, as sativas usually make me anxious. However, I quite like this. I have ADD, so this strain is especially helpful to me. I have written essays while high on this stuff. It helps me focus while at the same time calming my body.â€

â€œI really like this strain a lot so far! It can bring you out of the doldrums very swiftly. I also think it's tasty and the clear head high is very refreshing. I get definite euphoria and a general sense of peace from this. It's not a jolt like a normal sativa, this is definitely a slow and steady wins the race type of high. I'd recommend it highly!â€

â€œVery tasty strain with a catch: In small doses it's nice and heady kinda like Trainwreck, but in larger doses (Bong, blunt, etc) it'll put your ass straight to sleep. So if you're looking for a great night time strain look no further, but be careful otherwise :)â€

â€œI'm over 40 I just remember that we used to have brown waiting green weed and then somebody said the word hydroponic and the next thing I knew is I had permafrost and I remember it and it was 23 +years ago and it's was around after I gave up smoking after I had bills and kids. Still got bills.........kids grown both college aged. It will creep  on you body after head first no punching in my face just comes over you a...â€
â€œVery melo. Smooth, can be weak sometimes. Very good day weed, pain relief, but still fully functional. Recently used to relieve a migraine headache, worked perfectly.â€

â€œA nice, smooth rip from a foot long Gandalf pipe. The last time I tasted it I remember it being mintier, but there was a nice, strong aftertaste to it this time. It's a really quality hybrid, that is leaning on the sativa side with the first couple of hits. Rushes straight to the head, but after 2 or 3 bowls you can feel the indica taking over. Permafrost is always a quality smoke.â€
â€œIf you look at Permafrost under a magnifying glass for more than three seconds, then you'll want to buy some...excellent strain for strong yet functional daytime use.â€
â€œTemp control on the cool side makes this strain very happy.â€

â€œI was actually disappointed when I got home, this was listed and sold to me as an indica dominant hybrid. I was purposely getting one sativa one indica. Instead I have two sativa's and am not going to have any sleep aid until I get more money.

I definitely notice a pine or minty aroma, the buzzkit lasts me about 3.5 hoursâ€
â€œI like this strain. It works OK for pain but very well for depression and anxiety. It comes on slow and doesn't take long to hit. I felt very relaxed and I always sleep well when I smoke this.â€

â€œLONG-time favorite for the happy effect. plus just general good mood it presents. Great taste and burns well, if a little too fast.
My only complaint is it can be a little harsh" at times and does make my nose run more than others.â€"

â€œThis is, for sure a forever-favorite strain. Itâ€™s put me in the best mood Iâ€™ve ever been in along time. I was having an off day at work and in a bad mood too and after smoking permafrost I forgot why I was mad today at work. I smoked around 1215 am and it made me have a relaxing body high with enough energy to stay motivated. Not sluggish at all. Iâ€™ve been dealing with depression and anxiety and right now, I feel lik...â€

â€œDidn't get the affect I was looking for, says it's supposed to be a happy high and really relaxing. But I find my self feeling down and way to relaxed(couch locked), almost a depressed feeling in my opinion, not a happy high, but a very relaxed and slow high. Also very rough hits, kinda burns the back of my throat.â€
â€œHands down my favorite strain. I use it in flower and sugar wax. You must really give this one a try! But be warned this one is a mind twister. If you want a relaxing smoke, give it a try.â€

â€œgot this from  a local dispense that was sadly shut down. this is called dark black angel...was pretty damn good i must say.  grinded pretty good in the picture, getting ready for baking :) also vaped it worked great for my spasms also migraines . this is a good strain.â€
â€œVery melo. Smooth, can be weak sometimes. Very good day weed, pain relief, but still fully functional. Recently used to relieve a migraine headache, worked perfectly.â€

â€œSome of the frostiest buds I have ever laid eyes on permafrost is a wonderful hybrid with a smooth flavor. The relaxing but uplifting effects make it great for weekend relaxing or after work but before dinner. I highly recommend trying this of you have the chance!â€

â€œIt was 6 dollars for a gram, and wanted to see if I could space some of the day with cheaper weed. I am very impressed with this weed.  I prefer Indica's,but I am diggin this Savtiva. Good for beginners or just for people that don't have a lot of money.  Me".

column3: â€œHuge big buds!  Smooth smoke with no rough edges.  Initially a bit of earthy taste in the mouth that seems to disappear pretty quickly.  Really a pleasant high.  A big calming for both mind and body with some small tingles and sensitivity increases.  Really just a feeling of being normally in control in a very relaxed environment; like going on vacation.â€

â€œI really like this strain a lot so far! It can bring you out of the doldrums very swiftly. I also think it's tasty and the clear head high is very refreshing. I get definite euphoria and a general sense of peace from this. It's not a jolt like a normal sativa, this is definitely a slow and steady wins the race type of high. I'd recommend it highly!â€

â€œThese buds were covered in more crystals than I've seen in a long time. The combo of white widow and trainwreck gave me an expectation of sativa dominant effects however I felt the effects were more indica dominant relaxing and relieving stomach pains. The body buzz from this strain is immensely strong.â€

â€œThis Permafrost oil was incredible! At 90.6% THC it was an amazing and clean sativa high! My senses felt at peak, but no anxiety or paranoia whatsoever! Truly amazing stuff, and really smooth to hit, even in a small rig with no water.â€

â€œPermafrost is true to its name with frosty crystals covering solid buds which some larger ones resemble a well trimmed Christmas tree covered in tinsel. This piney forest scented flower has a strong potency with rich flavor.  The aromas bring strong resemblance to pine sap and dew covered forest floor.  Earthy and woody notes play as a good bud for a gentleman to enjoy.â€

â€œIf I ever grow, this is the strain that I would choose. When it says it can help with ADD, it actually can, I can zone in and focus without questioning it. Great to do chores around the house but at the same time, if you need to relax the part indica lets your body chill out and feel great. Great taste too! I love grinding it up and smelling that fresh pine. Going on a hike would be awesome with this strain! Find a q...â€
